snippet: The Kurds are intent on maintaining their autonomy in developing their own oil resources, while federal government insists that only it has authority to grant access to Iraq’s natural resources.
abstract: Kurdistan is intent on maintaining its autonomy from Iraqi government in developing its own oil resources, while Baghdad insists that only it has authority to grant access to Iraq’s natural resources; Western oil companies risk Iraq's anger in signing contracts with Kurds..
lead_paragraph: The Kurds are intent on maintaining their autonomy in developing their own oil resources, while federal government insists that only it has authority to grant access to Iraq’s natural resources.

headline.seo: Baghdad and Kurdistan at Odds Over Oil
headline.main: Iraqi Government and Kurdistan at Odds Over Oil Production
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Government and Kurdistan at Odds Over Oil Production
